body: Your proposal is acceptable, we will leave this issue to you. Looking forward to your PR.

issue.title: Import labeled dataset

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
Feature Request: import labeled data sets in BIO format. Like:
```
SOCCER	O
-	O
JAPAN	B-LOC
GET	O
LUCKY	O
WIN	O
,	O
CHINA	B-PER
IN	O
SURPRISE	O
DEFEAT	O
.	O

Nadim	B-PER
Ladki	I-PER

AL-AIN	B-LOC
,	O
United	B-LOC
Arab	I-LOC
Emirates	I-LOC
1996-12-06 O
```
Btw, I love your tool, thanks for doing it open source

body: @serzh Are you still working on this? The model is changed a little and I am worried this will make trouble for your work.  And other issues might also need to change the model part too. Let me know your status.
@BrambleXu Sorry for the delay, have some hard days on work. I haven't started any refactoring now, I expect to start working on it within 2 weeks.

@serzh It's totally okay. I am sorry to hear that you have bad days on work. That does sound frustrating. In the other side, it is good to hear that you haven't started the refactoring work. @Hironsan is working on this task recently and it should finish soon. After his work finished, it would be great to hear your opinion.
That's great! I would be happy to participate in a review.
Should we change `Assignee` on this task to @Hironsan ?

issue.title: Redesign code and support labeled dataset import

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.
